title: Chintz fragment
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: Plain weave foundation. Mordant for 3 reds applied by brush or pen following pattern outline. Madder dyed. Blue applied by immersion after application of resist (chintz).
description: Diamond lattice with beads and ovals with isolated motifs in the center of each space. Although motifs are reused there is no formal repeat.
name: Chintz fragment
